    • Method Detail

      • place

        public boolean place(int x,
            int y,
            java.lang.String face)
        Place the Robot on the table. Valid location is within valid values of X and Y coordinates Valid face is one of valid directions
        Parameters:
        x - x coordinate of the location to place the robot
        y - y coordinate of the location to place the robot
        face - Robot's direction
        Returns:
        true if Robot is successfully placed on the table

      • getLocation

        public java.lang.String getLocation()
        Returns:
        Robot's current location coordinates and direction

      • changeDirection

        public void changeDirection(java.lang.String command)
        Turn the Robot to RIGHT or LEFT and update the Direction
        Parameters:
        command - RIGHT or LEFT

      • move

        public void move()
        Move the Robot one step forward in the current direction and set the X and Y coordinates

      • isPlaced

        To check if Robot is placed on the table
        Returns:
        true if Robot is placed on the table

      • setPlaced

        public void setPlaced(boolean placed)
        Parameters:
